NextGen Click-to-Call

Automate your calls! 

This browser extension allows users to initiate outgoing calls by clicking directly on phone numbers found in emails, websites, and most web-based CRMs.

Automatically identifies phone numbers anywhere in your browser on any site AND allows you to dial them with the click of a mouse! 

As part of the NextGen Click-to-Call, users receive a screen pop notification that shows in your web browser and/or your computer desktop. 

NOTE: Log-in to your NextGen Click-to-Call using your NextGen portal credentials.
